Action.Name: Group.AddObject
Action.Description: Adds an object on the page or dialog to the specified group. If the group does not exist, it will be created.

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object to add.

Action.Name: Group.AdjustPos
Action.Description: This action adjusts the position of each object in the group by the specified amount.

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The value to move objects on the X axis.

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The value to move objects on the Y axis.

Action.Name: Group.AdjustSize
Action.Description: This action adjusts the size of each object in the group by the specified amount.

Arg.Name: Width
Arg.Description: The number by which to adjust the width.

Arg.Name: Height
Arg.Description: The number by which to adjust the height.

Action.Name: Group.ClearSettings
Action.Description: Clears the specified settings bank from memory.

Arg.Name: Key
Arg.Description: The Group Memory Key to clear.

Action.Name: Group.Count
Action.Description: Counts the number of objects in a group.

Action.Name: Group.Create
Action.Description: Manually creates a group. This action is called automatically when an object is created within [Group.CreateObject()] or added to [Group.AddObject()] a group.

Action.Name: Group.CreateObject
Action.Description: This performs the same action as Page/DialogEx.CreateObject() as well as adding the newly-created object to the specified group (and also creating the group if it does not exist).

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object to create.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: The table containing the object's properties.

Action.Name: Group.Delete
Action.Description: Deletes a group from memory along with all of that group's objects from the page/dialog.

Action.Name: Group.DeleteInactiveSettings
Action.Description: Deletes all sections, from the specified settings file, that reference groups which are no longer in memory.

Arg.Name: File
Arg.Description: The full path to the settings file where group information is stored.

Action.Name: Group.DeleteObject
Action.Description: Deletes an object from the page/dialog and removes it from the specified group (Optionally, the group is deleted if the last object is removed from the group).

Arg.Name: Remove Group
Arg.Description: Whether or not to remove the group from memory if the listed object is the last in the group.

Action.Name: Group.DoesExist
Action.Description: Determines whether or not a group exists.

Action.Name: Group.Enumerate
Action.Description: Gets the group objects and each object's common properties. Use Group.GetObjects() to get a table containing each object's full properties.

Action.Name: Group.GetEnabled
Action.Description: Determines whether or not all of the objects in a group are enabled.

Action.Name: Group.GetGroupNames
Action.Description: Gets all of the groups names of the currently active groups.

Action.Name: Group.GetObjects
Action.Description: Gets all of the objects within a specified group and their complete properties tables.

Action.Name: Group.GetRectPos
Action.Description: Returns the position of the group's two-dimensional rectangle referencing the top-left corner.

Action.Name: Group.GetRectSize
Action.Description: Returns the size of the group's two-dimensional rectangle.

Action.Name: Group.GetVisible
Action.Description: Determines whether or not all of the objects in a group are visible.

Action.Name: Group.LoadSettings
Action.Description: Loads and applys settings to a specific group froma group settings file (which is created by Group.SaveSettings()).

Arg.Name: File
Arg.Description: The full path to the settings file where group information is stored.

Action.Name: Group.Merge
Action.Description: Merges one group with another.

Arg.Name: Destination Group
Arg.Description: The group that will receive the other group's obejcts and their properties.

Arg.Name: Source Group
Arg.Description: The group from which the objects originate,

Action.Name: Group.ObjectDoesExist
Action.Description: Determines whether an object exists on the current page/dialog.

Action.Name: Group.ObjectIsInGroup
Action.Description: Determines whether or not an object is referenced in the specified group's settings.

Action.Name: Group.RecallSettings
Action.Description: Recalls and applys settings to a specified group from a Group Memory Key created by the Group.StoreSettings() function.

Arg.Name: Group
Arg.Description: The name of the group to which the settings will be applied.

Arg.Name: Key
Arg.Description: The Group Memory Key from which the settings will be derived.

Action.Name: Group.Remove
Action.Description: Removes a group and all of its object references from memory.

Action.Name: Group.RemoveObject
Action.Description: Removes an object's reference from the specified group (Optionally, the group is removed if the last object is removed from the group).

Arg.Name: Remove Group
Arg.Description: Whether or not to remove the group if the listed object is the last in the group.

Action.Name: Group.Rename
Action.Description: Renames a group.

Arg.Name: Group
Arg.Description: The original name of the group.

Arg.Name: New Name
Arg.Description: The name by which the group will be referenced hence.

Action.Name: Group.SaveSettings
Action.Description: Saves a group and its object settings to a file.

Arg.Name: File
Arg.Description: The full path to the settings file where group information is stored.

Action.Name: Group.SetEnabled
Action.Description: Enables or disables all items in the specified group.

Arg.Name: Enable
Arg.Description: Whether or not to enable the group objects.

Action.Name: Group.SetPos
Action.Description: Sets the position of each object in the specified group to the specified coordinates.

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The value of X the coordinate.

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The value of the Y coordinate.

Action.Name: Group.SetRectPos
Action.Description: Moves the group rectangle to the specified coordinates using the left-most and top-most object as reference.

Arg.Name: X
Arg.Description: The value of the X coordinate.

Arg.Name: Y
Arg.Description: The value of the Y coordinate.

Action.Name: Group.SetSize
Action.Description: Sets the size of each object in the specified group to the specified size.

Arg.Name: Width
Arg.Description: The number in width to set each object in the group.

Arg.Name: Height
Arg.Description: The number in height to set each object in the group.

Action.Name: Group.SetVisible
Action.Description: Set all of the objects in the specified group to visible or not visible.

Arg.Name: Make Visible
Arg.Description: Whether or not to make all of the group's objects visible.

Action.Name: Group.StoreSettings
Action.Description: Stores a group and its object references and settings in Group Memory Key which is stored in memory for later recall by the Group.RecallSettings() function.

Arg.Name: Key
Arg.Description: The Group Memory Key in which to store the settings.

Action.Name: Group.ToggleEnabled
Action.Description: Toggles the enabled status of each individual object in the specified group.

Action.Name: Group.ToggleVisible
Action.Description: Toggles the visible status of each individual object in the specified group.

Extended.Name: Group
Extended.Description:
This plugin allows the programmer to make groups of objects and manipulate them.
Original concept by Worm and RizlaUK.
Extended.Author: Centauri Soldier
Extended.InstallNotes: Place the "Group" folder inside your "AutoPlay Media Studio/Plugins/Actions" folder.
